author: malvern-online.com
title: Houston, TX Author Publishes NCLEX Review Book | User | malvern-online.com
text:
(PRLeap.com) "NCLEX Strategy and Pharmacology Review Book", a new book by Julie Chinwe Anyanwu, RN, NPCH, MSN, has been released by Dorrance Publishing Co., Inc.
The purpose of this book is to offer strategies for answering questions concerning content, prioritization, pharmacology, and Next Generation exam questions to nurse students preparing for the NCLEX Exam and those taking the test again.
"NCLEX Strategy and Pharmacology Review Book" is a 198-page paperback with a retail price of $63.00 (eBook $58.00). The ISBN is 979-8-89211-149-2. Published by Dorrance Publishing Co., Inc. of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. For members of the press, to request a review copy or author interview, please visit https://bookstore.dorrancepublishing.com/pages/media-requests or to buy the book, visit our online bookstore at https://bookstore.dorrancepublishing.com/products/nclex-strategy-and-pharmacology-review-book GET IN TOUCH
Natasha Hlinka
Dorrance Publishing
http://www.dorrancepublishing.com
You can see the original version and more on PRLeap here: http://www.prleap.com/pr/305530/houston-tx-author-publishes-nclex-review-book
